name: Be A Bee
description:
Chosen theme: Nature's protectors

Diversifiers: Minimal Control, Run!

Categories: Mobile, Hypercasual

Santiago, Chile.

Genaro Claps: Unity Programmer/UI designer. Portfolio here.

Leonardo Muñoz: Music composer/Sound effects designer. Portfolio here and here.

Ariel Quinteros: 3D modelling/Animation. Porfolio here.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Be a Bee not only makes you put yourself in the shoes (or the wings) of a bee, but it also makes you live the struggles that a bee must go through to get to that sweet, sweet pollen.

The game consists of pollinating as many flowers as possible within a given time and then flying to the honeycomb to complete each level.

Touch the screen and drag the stick to move the bee to the flower corolla. Once the bee is perched, release the stick for a few seconds to let the bee extract that sweet pollen, once the flower spins out of pure joy, go to the next flower. But be careful, stay away from dangers lurking around, or you might drop pollen (the queen wouldn't be too happy about it).
